explains: n. 微米（等于百万分之一米）

sentences.en: That brings the resolution to half a micron, or 500 nanometres.
sentences.cn: 这样便将图象分辨率提高到了0.5微米或500纳米。

sentences.en: 12-micron light is shown in orange, and 22-micron light is shown in red.
sentences.cn: 12微米光谱显示的是橙色，22微米则为红色。

sentences.en: Ash particles are normally in the 50-100 micron (0.05 to 0.1 millimetre) range.
